Text: The Bernese Mountain Dog (German: "Berner Sennenhund" ) is a large-sized breed of dog, one of the four breeds of Sennenhund-type dogs from the Swiss Alps.

Triplets:
<The Bernese Mountain Dog
1:
--------------------
Text: Bernese Mountain Dog:  The name "Sennenhund" is derived from the German "Senne" ("alpine pasture") and "Hund" ("dog"), as they accompanied the alpine herders and dairymen called "Senn".

Text: Bernese Mountain Dog:  This mountain dog was originally kept as a general farm dog.
